abstract: British government plans to sell its remaining 14 percent stake in Royal Mail, which operates country's postal service; previous sale of 15 percent stake raised 750 million pounds.
lead_paragraph: The government holds just below a 14 percent stake in the company and plans to sell its remaining holdings in an offering to institutional investors.

headline.main: British Government to Sell Remaining Stake in Royal Mail
headline.print_headline: Business Briefing; British Government Will Sell Remaining Stake in Royal Mail

snippet: The government holds just below a 14 percent stake in the company and plans to sell its remaining holdings in an offering to institutional investors.
